original_text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together: for before they were at enmity between themselves.
korean_text: 헤롯과 빌라도가 전에는 원수였으나 당일에 서로 친구가 되니라

sentences.original_text: And same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together
sentences.korean_translation: 그날 같은 날 빌라도와 헤롯이 친구가 되었고

sentences.original_text: for before they were at enmity between themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 이전에는 그들 사이에 적대감이 있었기 때문입니다
